Html:
Added mention to this project on my blog :)

http://www.oculushut.com/blog/shop/

I've seen another project where there is an attempt to create a "cinema". Seems like this would not be too far from the experience when projecting onto a plane with this utility... do not have my Oculus Rift yet though, but will try to test once I receive it!

Thanks for what looks like a cool app!

Not sure if anybody is still watching this, but there is definitely interest in this kind of thing on the Oculus VR Development site :)

Link below (you will need to be logged in though):

https://developer.oculusvr.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=42&t=92&p=1673#p1673
Hi, sorry if this is the wrong place to post, but I cant seem to get the media player to work. When I try to open an .mkv file that is SBS in rift mode, the screen is just blank.
